results.title: How Francis Ford Coppola Got Pulled Back In to Make ‘The Godfather, Coda’
results.abstract: The director and cast, including Al Pacino, Sofia Coppola and Andy Garcia, look back at making “Part III,” which has been re-edited (and retitled) for its 30th anniversary.

multimedia.copyright: Mark Mahaney for The New York Times
multimedia.caption: Over the years, Coppola has reordered and restored parts of the trilogy. But he’s now 81 and with the re-editing of “Coda” has probably put his final stamp on the series.

results.abstract: “Hi friends, I want to share with you that I am trans, my pronouns are he/they and my name is Elliot,” Page wrote in a statement that he posted on Tuesday.

results.title: How to Pretend You’re in Tokyo
results.abstract: That Tokyo trip will have to wait for the millions of people who canceled flights and hotel bookings. But there are ways to bring you closer to this sometimes impenetrable, always fascinating, city.

results.title: Michel Robin, Longtime French Character Actor, Dies at 90
results.abstract: Best known in the United States for his role in the 2001 film “Amélie,” he was a staple of the Comédie-Française theater company and a familiar supporting actor in dozens of movies.

multimedia.caption: The French actor Michel Robin in 1990, when he won an award as best supporting actor for his role in the play “La Traversée de l’Hiver” (“Winter Crossing”).

results.title: On TikTok, Fans Are Making Their Own ‘Ratatouille’ Musical
results.abstract: Thousands of TikTok users, including musical theater professionals, are creating a Broadway-style adaptation of the animated Disney film about a rat with culinary aspirations.

multimedia.copyright: Walt Disney Pictures and Pixar Animation Studios
multimedia.caption: In “Ratatouille,” the 2007 Disney Pixar film, a rat, Remy, dreams of becoming a chef. With theaters closed during the pandemic, actors and other fans are creating musical tributes to the film on TikTok.

results.title: Dave Prowse, Man Behind Darth Vader’s Mask, Is Dead at 85
results.abstract: Mr. Prowse went from being a weight lifting champion in Britain to helping portray one of the most memorable villains in movie history. But his voice did not make the edit.

results.title: HBO Documentary Has Competition. These Women Don’t Seem Worried.
